about.title: About Me
about.description:
IT Consultant with 15+ years experience in business automation and system implementation. Currently webmaster and Python developer creating AI-integrated solutions. Expert in business analysis, process optimization, and problem-solving through automation. Continuously learning and testing new technologies. Skilled at managing and overseeing developer tasks or developing independently using AI tools.
Based in Sweden, prefer remote work.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Professional resume optimized for recruitment (2 pages)
resume.summary_text: Experienced IT Consultant and Python Developer with 15+ years in ERP/CRM implementation and business automation. Currently developing AI-integrated solutions for international legal services while managing diverse freelance projects. Proven track record of leading development teams, implementing complex systems across multiple retail locations, and co-owning a successful IT consultancy. Fluent in Russian, English, and Swedish.
resume.skills_ai_list: Python, TensorFlow, scikit-learn, pandas, NumPy, FastAPI, Machine Learning
resume.skills_db_list: MS SQL Server, Oracle, T-SQL, PostgreSQL, Power BI, OLAP, Data Analytics
resume.skills_erp_list: Bitrix24, PlanFix, SAP Integration, 1C:Enterprise, WMS/TMS Systems
resume.skills_web_list: WordPress, PHP, JavaScript, SEO, Google Ads, Digital Marketing
resume.edu_cert_1_name: Python Programming and AI Development Certification
resume.edu_cert_list: Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Database Implementation & Maintenance, Bitrix24 CRM Expert, IBM Cognos BI 8.4, ERP System Implementation (ISACA)
resume.project_1_desc: Modern Next.js 15 website with multi-language support (EN/SV), NextAuth authentication, blog system, and interactive pricing calculator
resume.project_2_desc: AI-powered Flask application for automated GDPR compliance analysis with bilingual interface and professional PDF report generation
resume.project_3_desc: Intelligent legal chatbot using RAG technology, LangChain, and multiple LLM models (Llama 2, Zephyr 7B, Mistral 7B) with multilingual support
resume.project_4_desc: Web application for batch PDF compression with dual-mode operation: MEGA Cloud integration and local folder support via File System Access API
resume.project_5_desc: Desktop notification system for PlanFix tasks with modular architecture, toast notifications, task categorization, and system tray integration
resume.project_6_desc: Corporate website for international legal services with multi-language support, client portal integration, and automated lead management system
resume.project_7_desc: Interactive Streamlit ML application with MNIST-trained Random Forest model for real-time digit recognition
resume.project_8_desc: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for optimal performance and SEO
